definition: to deliver/to carry/to give (as a present)/to present (with)/to see off/to send
surname Li/abbr. for 禮記|礼记[Li3 ji4], Classic of Rites

sentences.english: In ancient times it was etiquette to present your full-size visiting card when giving someone a gift.
sentences.chinese: 古時候，送禮物時附上自己的名帖，是一種禮儀。

sentences.english: B. His long service with the company was acknowledged with a present.
sentences.chinese: 向他贈送禮品以感謝他長期來對公司的服務。

sentences.english: See examples of theme gift baskets with expert gift giving advice in this free video clip.
sentences.chinese: 請看專家在此免費送禮視頻剪輯諮詢主題禮籃的例子。

sentences.english: Prudence is using the presents I have been getting as New Year gifts to tradesmen.
sentences.chinese: 普律當絲用我收到的新年禮物來送禮。

sentences.english: It's our custom to unwrap a present in the donor's presence.
sentences.chinese: 我們一般不在送禮人面前打開或者評論禮物。

sentences.english: Keep individual gift giving outside the office.
sentences.chinese: 不要在辦公室裏單獨送禮物。

sentences.english: But the dog egg tenacity and every time I come persistence give to the elderly gifts.
sentences.chinese: 但是狗蛋百折不撓，每次來堅持給給老人送禮。

sentences.english: He said that people exchange gifts at Christmas.
sentences.chinese: 他說人們常在聖誕節互送禮物。

sentences.english: Is this really the example you want to set for us impressionable kids?
sentences.chinese: 難道你真的是想送禮物給容易受感動的孩子嗎？

sentences.english: It is the heart of the giver that makes the gift precious.
sentences.chinese: 每個送禮者都希望贈送別人珍貴的禮物。

sentences.english: Therefore, the gifts will become the best expression Dayi a mode of communication.
sentences.chinese: 因此，送禮也就成了最能表情達意的一種溝通方式。

sentences.english: The adjudicating personnel shall not accept a treat or gift from the parties or their agents.
sentences.chinese: 審判人員不得接受當事人及其訴訟代理人請客送禮。

sentences.english: Regarding has gives a present the congratulation, Zhou Yumin replied ambiguously .
sentences.chinese: 對於有沒有送禮祝賀，周渝民含糊回答。

sentences.english: I was a decent gift giver when we were dating.
sentences.chinese: 我們約會那會兒我是一個像樣的送禮專家。

sentences.english: No time for an engagement party or bridal shower .
sentences.chinese: 都沒時間辦訂婚晚會或者新娘送禮會。

definition: money wrapped in red as a gift/bonus payment/kickback/bribe
to arrange/to set out/to decorate/to display/decorative items
to drop in/to visit/to lock a door/(of a shop) to close/to go and live with one's wife's family, in effect becoming a member of her family
to send/to give as a present
to go abroad/to leave the country/emigration
